channel.title: Ian Currie's Stoneware Glazes
channel.description:
![book_cover|346x500](/uploads/default/original/1X/7651c2b679d9206ca2fe2c47b67961634fdeceb4.jpg)
Ian has decided to make his book Stoneware Glazes - A Systematic Approach available for free under a creative commons license. This means that you are free to remix, tweak, and build upon the work even for commercial purposes, as long as you credit Ian Currie and license your new creations under identical terms.
**Download the book here:** https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wiki-glazy-org/documents/IanCurrieStonewareGlazes.pdf
